quest.name: A Blissful Arrival
journal: Alphinaud seems satisfied that he and Watt are of one mind.
objectives: Wait inside the gate to the Ala Mhigan Quarter.

dialogue.name: WATT
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: WISCAR
dialogue.text: Grandad and his friends are already hard at work─the rest of us can do no less, eh?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: It seems Wiscar has the Saltery's security well in hand. I, meanwhile, have discussed the next steps with Master Watt, and completed my inspection of the site.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: With a little work, the vacant buildings here could be made into very presentable dwellings.

dialogue.name: FLAMEHERALD
dialogue.text: Message from General Aldynn!

dialogue.name: FLAMEHERALD
dialogue.text: Apologies for the interruption, misssir, but the General would speak with you at your earliest convenience!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Do not feel obliged to wait around on my account. I will remain here to hammer out the finer details with Watt, and act as an intermediary with our business partners in Ul'dah. You should go.

dialogue.name: FLAMEHERALD
dialogue.text: General Aldynn asked that you wait for him by the main gate in the Ala Mhigan Quarter. My apologies again, misssir! Fare you well!

dialogue.name: WATT
dialogue.text: That Alphinaud's a bright lad, isn't he? I told him what we'd need to repair the place and he tallied up the total cost on the spot─and it weren't a small number, either!

dialogue.name: WISCAR
dialogue.text: I'll ask Commander Hext to assign a squad to patrol the Saltery's harvesting and fishing spots. And I'll be sure to tell them what you told me!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Pray leave the administrative tasks to me. General Aldynn will be waiting.

dialogue.name: ARENVALD
dialogue.text: I was just on my way to the Saltery─it's lucky I saw you!

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: Arenvald seems flustered. Something is amiss...

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: That took longer than I intended, but at least you know where I stand.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text:
Now that's settled...
Arenvald─what news?

dialogue.name: ARENVALD
dialogue.text: We may have a problem, sir.

dialogue.name: ARENVALD
dialogue.text: A group of Ananta has arrived at the main gates. And I don't mean the Vira. These are Qalyana─the ones that summoned the primal.

dialogue.name: ARENVALD
dialogue.text: They're insisting they be allowed to attend the council. Lyse is trying to reason with them, but she may need help...

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: Hmm... An invitation was extended to all of the native beast tribes...but we assumed the Qalyana would refuse it out of hand.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: We had best go and see for ourselves. Pipin, take command of our forces and be ready for battle.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Forename─you've dealt with these Qalyana before. I'd have you at my side.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Forename! Raubahn! Gods, it's good to see you...

dialogue.name: QALYANAPATRIARCH
dialogue.text: Ah! The ssslayer has come.

dialogue.name: QALYANAPATRIARCH
dialogue.text: We have not forgotten how you sssinned againssst the Lady of Blisss...but we did not come here to shed blood.

dialogue.name: QALYANAPATRIARCH
dialogue.text: You claim to ssseek harmony with all who call Gyr Abania home. If thisss is truly your wish, you will welcome usss as envoys of the Ananta!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: It is our wish, and you are welcome. But we cannot condone the summoning of primals.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: If you want to enter the palace, I must ask that you first surrender any crystal jewelry. You have my word that it will all be returned to you when the meeting is over.

dialogue.name: QALYANAPATRIARCH
dialogue.text: ...We will do as you asssk─but you will not have our weapons. We are not ssso foolish as to place ourssselves entirely at the mercy of our tormentors...

dialogue.name: RESISTANCEWARRIOR
dialogue.text: I reckon that's the closest we're going to get to a compromise. And we will have people standing guard...

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Aye, let them keep their swords.

dialogue.name: QALYANAPATRIARCH
dialogue.text: Then we have an agreement. Lead the way to your meeting chamber.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Why do I have the feeling we've welcomed a viper into our midst...?

obj.n: The Measure of His Reach Orchestrion Roll
